Source.Name: rocm-core
Source.Summary: A utility which can be used to get ROCm release version
Source.Description: rocm-core is a utility which can be used to get ROCm release version. It also provides the Lmod modules files for the ROCm release. The getROCmVersion function provides the ROCm version.
